data.lyric:
[ti:favorite crime]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]favorite crime - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:02.25]Lyrics by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:04.50]Composed by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:06.75]Know that I loved you so bad
[00:09.47]I let you treat me like that
[00:12.04]I was your willing accomplice honey
[00:15.69]
[00:17.41]And I watched as you fled the scene
[00:20.41]Doe-eyed as you buried me
[00:23.10]One heart broke four hands bloody
[00:26.95]
[00:27.63]The things I did
[00:29.43]
[00:31.20]Just so I could call you mine
[00:35.39]
[00:38.53]The things you did
[00:41.14]
[00:41.92]Well I hope I was your favorite crime
[00:49.14]
[00:50.58]You used me as an alibi
[00:53.38]I crossed my heart as you crossed the line
[00:56.02]And I defended you to all my friends
[00:59.71]
[01:01.23]And now every time a siren sounds
[01:04.36]I wonder if you're around
[01:06.86]'Cause you know that I'd do it all again
[01:10.46]
[01:11.31]Oh the things I did
[01:14.04]
[01:15.44]Just so I could call you mine
[01:19.64]
[01:22.83]The things you did
[01:25.43]
[01:26.16]Well I hope I was your favorite crime
[01:33.22]
[01:34.56]It's bittersweet to think about the damage that we'd do
[01:37.33]'Cause I was goin' down but I was doin' it with you
[01:40.13]Yeah everything we broke and all the trouble that we made
[01:42.86]But I say that I hate you with a smile on my face
[01:49.87]
[01:50.50]Oh look what we became
[01:55.55]Oh the things I did
[01:58.02]
[01:59.64]Just so I could call you mine
[02:03.69]
[02:06.46]Oh the things you did
[02:09.23]
[02:10.24]Well I hope I was your favorite crime
[02:17.94]Your favorite crime your favorite crime
[02:27.81]
[02:28.86]'Cause baby you were mine
data.trans:
[ti:favorite crime]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.25]//
[00:04.50]//
[00:06.75]你知道我深爱着你
[00:09.47]我任由你伤害我
[00:12.04]我是你的帮凶 亲爱的
[00:15.69]
[00:17.41]我看着你逃离现场
[00:20.41]你埋葬我的时候双眼无辜
[00:23.10]一颗心支离破碎 两双手沾满我的血
[00:26.95]
[00:27.63]我做了这些
[00:29.43]
[00:31.20]只是为了能跟你在一起
[00:35.39]
[00:38.53]你做的这些
[00:41.14]
[00:41.92]我希望我是你犯下的罪行中 最爱的一桩
[00:49.14]
[00:50.58]你拿我来做不在场证明
[00:53.38]我宣誓忠诚 而你越过了界
[00:56.02]我在我朋友面前对你百般维护
[00:59.71]
[01:01.23]现在每一次警铃大响
[01:04.36]我都好奇是不是你在附近
[01:06.86]因为你知道我会重蹈覆辙
[01:10.46]
[01:11.31]我做了这些
[01:14.04]
[01:15.44]只是为了能跟你在一起
[01:19.64]
[01:22.83]你做的这些
[01:25.43]
[01:26.16]我希望我是你犯下的罪行中 最爱的一桩
[01:33.22]
[01:34.56]一想到我们会造成的伤害 就感觉苦乐参半
[01:37.33]因为我深陷其中 但是因为你我才会如此
[01:40.13]是啊 我们毁掉的一切 我们造成的所有麻烦
[01:42.86]但我在说我恨你时 依然面带笑容
[01:49.87]
[01:50.50]看看我们成了什么样
[01:55.55]我做了这些
[01:58.02]
[01:59.64]只是为了能跟你在一起
[02:03.69]
[02:06.46]你做的这些
[02:09.23]
[02:10.24]我希望我是你犯下的罪行中 最爱的一桩
[02:17.94]你最爱的罪行 你最爱的罪行
[02:27.81]
[02:28.86]因为宝贝 你曾是我的伴侣
